channel.title: How do I change the xp the dummy gives you when you attack?
channel.description: Because i hit it once and i am already at 62 atk in one hit can some one give me a key word to search it and the numbers i should type in?

item.title: How do I change the xp the dummy gives you when you attack?
item.dc:creator: @barkingdogc barkingdogc
item.description:
@barkingdogc wrote:

hey x-j-k-x why do you have three because it might anser one of my problems with my server
when i guy get 99 in any level and clicks it agian he goes right up to 135 lol if that the reason theres three because i put all three at the same xp rate

Read full topic

item.title: How do I change the xp the dummy gives you when you attack?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

addSkillXP((250*playerLevel[0]), 0);
addSkillXP((750*playerLevel[3]), 3);
addSkillXP((750*playerLevel[19]), 19);

Woop, change them

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the xp the dummy gives you when you attack?

item.title: How do I change the xp the dummy gives you when you attack?
item.dc:creator: @Anti_Pizza Anti Pizza
item.description:
@Anti_Pizza wrote:

case 823:
if (actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You hit the dummy and gained Attack exp…”);
setAnimation(0x326);
addSkillXP((250playerLevel[0]), 0);
addSkillXP((750playerLevel[3]), 3);
addSkillXP((750*playerLevel[19]), 19);
actionTimer = 12;
}

here

item.title: How do I change the xp the dummy gives you when you attack?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Key word: dummy

–

Lal. Kidding, you need to find the right case, or if it sends a message liek.

Example: You strike the dummy and gain attack XP!!

Example#2: You hit the door and what the hell! You fall ofa cus u r nub.

Etc…
